description: AA for arbitrage between interest and stable tokens on bonded stablecoins.

field_descriptions.open_deposit: Open a new deposit and sell the stable tokens on oswap.
field_descriptions.close_deposit: Buy stable tokens on oswap and close a deposit.
field_descriptions.id: ID of the deposit to close or unlock.
field_descriptions.unlock: Unlock the funds reserved in closing a deposit after the close request is resolved in any way.
field_descriptions.weaker_id: ID of the weaker deposit to indicate in a challenge.
field_descriptions.asset: Asset to withdraw from bank AA.
field_descriptions.withdraw_management_fee: Withdraw the management fee accrued since the last withdrawal.
field_descriptions.withdraw_success_fee: Withdraw the success fee accrued since the last withdrawal.
field_descriptions.withdraw_bytes: Withdraw bytes accumulated on the AA through bounce fees.
